程序包 compiler.io

接口 Reader

所有已知实现类:
ChannelReader
public interface Reader
Used for read source files.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    default boolean
    available()
    Determine whether the reader can be read more.
    void
    mark()
    Mark the reader at the current state, may use reset in future to recover the state.
    Integer
    next()
    Get the next character.
    Integer
    peek()
    Peek the next character without moving to next position.
    Position
    position()
    Get the current position.
    void
    reset()
    Reset the reader to the marked state before, makes no effect if not marked.
    boolean
    skip()
    Skip the next character

  • 方法详细资料

    • next

      Integer next() throws IOException
      Get the next character.
      返回:
      the next character
      抛出:
      IOException - when underlying io fail

    • peek

      Integer peek() throws IOException
      Peek the next character without moving to next position.
      返回:
      The next character
      抛出:
      IOException - when underlying io fail

    • skip

      boolean skip() throws IOException
      Skip the next character
      返回:
      true if skip the next character successful, false otherwise, (e.g)reach the end of the file
      抛出:
      IOException - when underlying io fail

    • available

      default boolean available() throws IOException
      Determine whether the reader can be read more.
      返回:
      whether the reader can be read more
      抛出:
      IOException

    • mark

      void mark()
      Mark the reader at the current state, may use reset in future to recover the state.
      另请参阅:
      reset()

    • reset

      void reset()
      Reset the reader to the marked state before, makes no effect if not marked.
      另请参阅:
      mark()

    • position

      Position position()
      Get the current position.
      返回:
      the current position
